Utility table for conversion bds --> lex_gsed

Source: R/data.R
bds_gsed.Rd

Utility table for conversion bds --> lex_gsed

bds_gsed

Format

A data frame

lex_gsed

GSED item name

bds

BDS number

bdsr

BDS number for right

bdsl

BDs number for left

type

g1:direct, g2: direct-right/left, m1:message, m2: message-right/left, gr: direct-right, gl: direct-left, mr:message-right, ml:message-left

bds_label

Dutch label

labelEN

English label

Source

This table is constructed from dscore::bds_edited.csv by script data-raw/R/bds_gsed_table.R
